QuestData.Title: Sunset Kings
QuestData.Description: Olon had a clever idea. He thinks that we should visit the sprites to the west, and ask them if they have any of these ingredients. Some of the elements to this recipe are seeming... strange.$b$bThe Rikkitun sprites have a village to the west of Kor'vess. I hope to see you there, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Sapmaster Vu at Rikkitun Village.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Sapmaster Vu at Rikkitun Village in Dread Wastes.
QuestData.RewardText: It's been a while since I brewed on the road.
